translations: n．木材：从树木中锯出的木头，用于建筑、家具等。
· We need more lumbers to finish the construction.
我们需要更多的木材来完成建筑。
v．笨拙地行走：缓慢、笨重地移动。
· The elephant lumbers through the jungle.

sentences.sentence: Every morning, he used a lorry to carry the lumbers to the railway station.
sentences.translation: 每天上午，他用一辆卡车装运木材去火车站。

sentences.sentence: As your bad interview lumbers on, dont wait until your interviewer asks you if you have any questions.
sentences.translation: 当一次糟糕的面试尴尬地进行时，不要等面试者来问你有没有问题要问。

sentences.sentence: As your bad interview lumbers on, don't wait until your interviewer asks you if you have any questions.
sentences.translation: 当一次糟糕的面试尴尬地进行时，不要等面试者来问你有没有问题要问。
